hive_lesson.title: 12 Where is everyone?
hive_lesson.description: Daniel talks about what his family is doing.\n(Present Continuous)

hive_text_custom.text: : Well, everyone is doing something right now.
: My mom? She's at the mall. I think she's shopping. I think she's getting the groceries for the week.
: Well, every weekend he goes to the country club, so I think he's playing golf with his friend now.
: My brother, he's upstairs. I think he's probably sleeping or playing video games as he always does. And my sister, she's at school. She's playing soccer cause she has a game today.
: Oh, really? When does the game start?
: I think in twenty or thirty minutes.
: Really, that sounds fun. Let's go.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 3) What is his brother probably doing?

hive_vocab.examples:
What is everyone doing?
What is your sister doing?
What is your dad doing?

Everyone is doing something.
She is studying at school.
He is working at home.

She is not cooking now.
 
She is not playing videos games now.
He is not workign today.

Is she playing today?
 
Is he getting ready?
Are they waiting for me?

Not  that I know of
 
I hope so
I think so
